entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
